person.name: Carl B. Pratt
person.description: Elder Carl B. Pratt was sustained a member of the First Quorum of the Seventy of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter day Saints on April 5, 1997. He previously served as an Area Seventy in the South America North Area. As a member of the First Quorum, he has served as president of the Mexico South and South America North areas and as a counselor in the Chile Area. He is currently serving as a counselor in the Asia Area.
